div.class: s_faq_horizontal_entry col-12 mb-2 pt16 pb32 o_colored_level

button.class: accordion-header accordion-button justify-content-between gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none
button.span: What services does your company offer ?

div.p: Our company specializes in consulting, product development, and customer support. We tailor our services to fit the unique needs of businesses across various sectors, helping them grow and succeed in a competitive market.

button.class: accordion-header accordion-button collapsed justify-content-between gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none
button.span: How can I contact customer support ?

div.p: You can reach our customer support team by emailing info@yourcompany.example.com, calling +1 555-555-5556, or using the live chat on our website. Our dedicated team is available 24/7 to assist with any inquiries or issues.
We’re committed to providing prompt and effective solutions to ensure your satisfaction.

button.class: accordion-header accordion-button collapsed justify-content-between gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none

div.p: We offer a 30-day return policy for all products. Items must be in their original condition, unused, and include the receipt or proof of purchase. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days of receiving the returned item.
